sentence.Network_en: She slippered across the room from her bed.
sentence.Network_cn: 她下床穿着拖鞋走过房间

sentence.Network_en: She saw pairs of slippered feet -- but no one was moving.
sentence.Network_cn: 她看见一双双穿着拖鞋的脚 -- 可是谁也没有挪动一步.

sentence.Network_en: Vowed Charnel, who traveled everyplace With her slippered foot in a velvet case.
sentence.Network_cn: 查耐尔如此发誓,他到处游走带着装在天鹅绒盒子里的她穿着拖鞋的脚.
